column3: “Funky looking dark green nugs with oversized finger-like calyxes and thick orange hairs. Smell is skunky and pungent, but less so that other examples of Lamb’s Bread, with undertones of citrus and haze. Smoke is smooth and pungent like the smell, with a defined sharpness similar to Jack Herer or Haze. Effects are felt quickly, with a heady, cerebral and soaring type head high. I felt extremely euphoric and giggly, ha...”

“Got this from a dispensary in downtown Oakland. I like Sativas but am always a bit skeptical, as they vary a lot with me. Also I had tried Lambsbread before and was not impressed (Kings Bread is apparently a close relative). So getting this strain was a bit of a gamble.

But it was surprisingly good - I had a nice trippy time. Read on for the details:

The buds are tight and nice-looking with frosting, but not sp...”

“King's Bread is hybrid sativa dominate strain, which has a delectable taste.  Great sativa that will not induce anxiety, always a plus.  It even allows one to remain alert while feeling relaxed and euphoric.  This strain is also one of the grandparents of Bob Marley's Lamb's Bread.”

“Such a strong fresh lemon/citrus scent it is amazing, absolutely covered in trichomes so sticky, really nice for first thing in the a.m smoke, I definitely suggest this strain if you come across it.....and like sativas of course!!!!”

“Kings Bread: lineage is Lambs Bread that has been grown, left to flower and die, then regenerated back into vegative state and grown for a second season. Result is a much stronger plant but still an accourance of gardening technique.”

“King's Bread extract by GoldenXtrX is a great product. Smooth and mellow, the hits go down very easy. It has a strong flavor, earthy and a bit pungent it has a hint of lemon. This is one of my all time favorites. If you see it, buy it.”
“Great flavor, and great effects.  Always makes me feel happy and comfortable.”

“A very energetic, thoughtful high. I smoke this regularly and get no fuzziness at all. Tight, conical buds with strong citrus and pine odors. Not the bud to couch-lock you. Makes me want to go for a walk!”

“Took two hits off Magic-Flight; I'm relatively low-tolerance and that was too much, and I felt a little flattened - the good mental effects were there, but I was too weighed down to take advantage of them. Very optimistic, though, that a lower dosage would feel lighter and more energizing.”

“As a college student, I dont pick up sativa strains too often but something told me to venturr into the realm of sativas and I wasnt disappointed. MmmMmmMmmMMMMMm soo tasty. On exhale it tasted like sweet pine, silky smooth hit 👌 immediately I felt lighter, not physically or mentally" but in my SOULLLLL. beautiful. I can't comment on bud beauty because I got the end of the batch because the strain sold out way too ...”"
“One of my absolute favorites. Apparently it was bob marleys too. Hits pretty harsh, but u have to love it”
“One of the best tasting strains I've ever smoked.. Enjoy this one if you find it!”
“I bought King's Bread because of its high ranking in creative" effects
column4: and the other positive effects sounded great too: focused
column5: euphoric... It definitely turned on my Talkative side. The Euphoria was there in abundance... it was magical.

column2: the experience was of an intense yet clean happy place. And magical.”"

column3: “Very clear headed sativa high. Mello and relaxed while having creative energy to simmer with. Great for anxiety. Listed at 18% THC. It's a unique high and smoke experience.”
“citrus oder is real noticeable .kind of what gave it away. two hit I was easy sailings.”
“This strain has a great taste, one of the better ones I've vaped. The lingering headache is sort of irritating but overall, it's a pretty good high with an easy come down.”
“Tried this while in Jamaica. Very happy, giggly and partially hallucinating.”
“This strain (in my opinion) is a bit underground and not known. It's a gold mine if you find it!! So good!”

“Are you serious? Nah man kingsbread/kingsbreath is Lambsreath X Lambsbreath. And yeah its lambsbreath- its just when the rasta's speak it sounds like lambsbread.  Get right brah- quit messing up the genetics line”
